nodes.text: First skirmish in the Mesulan Remnants Belt

A skirmish occurred in the Mesulan Remnants Belt between Fyzen Gor and several Imperial TIE fighters. The Millennium Falcon, piloted by Lando Calrissian and L3-37, became involved after arriving in the Mesulan Remnants to follow a distress signal sent by the droid D9. Gor and his droids destroyed most of the fighters, but the Millennium Falcon escaped.
